page.title: 14ST.JOHNS CADETS SUTTON
page.content: The cadets are held at Sutton Welfare from 6.30 to 7.30. Anyone between 6 and 17 can join. We usually do first aid, but sometimes we go on treasure trails. The leader is Ruth O'Shea. The highest badge is the Grand Prior. You do not become a proper cadet until you have been enrolled. When you are enrolled you receive a white book and a dress badge. It is now that you can start towards a Grand Priors badge. To reach this you have to achieve 12 proficiencies. Every year there is a chance to go to Skegness free, but you have to attend inspection which lasts for about 30 minutes. The officers inspect the cadets uniforms to make sure their badges are on correctly and their uniforms are smart. by ANITA MOSLER.
